FuncDef: The display mbusnode command is used to view the register status of the monitorbus node.

ParaDef.Info:
Slot number, according to the different hardware devices have different values.
-

Examples: Type      SlotID    Register       TempMon   VoltMon   Eeprom
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When you need to check the registration status of the monitorbus node, you can run this command.
